class Solution(object):
    def minimumDistance(self, points):
        lp = len(points)
        psum = [p0 + p1 for p0, p1 in points]
        pdif = [p0 - p1 for p0, p1 in points]
        
        def getMax2(nums):
            p0, p1 = -1, -1
            for i, num in enumerate(nums):
                if p0 == -1 or nums[i] > nums[p0]: 
                    if p0 != -1: p1 = p0
                    p0 = i
                elif p1 == -1 or nums[i] > nums[p1]: p1 = i
            #print(p0, p1)
            return p0, p1
        
        def getMin2(nums):
            p0, p1 = -1, -1
            for i, num in enumerate(nums):
                if p0 == -1 or nums[i] < nums[p0]: 
                    if p0 != -1: p1 = p0
                    p0 = i
                elif p1 == -1 or nums[i] < nums[p1]: p1 = i
            #print(p0, p1)
            return p0, p1
        
        maxs0, maxs1 = getMax2(psum)
        mins0, mins1 = getMin2(psum)
        maxd0, maxd1 = getMax2(pdif)
        mind0, mind1 = getMin2(pdif)
        p = set((maxs0, maxs1, mins0, mins1, maxd0, maxd1, mind0, mind1))
        
        ret = 10**9
        for idx in p:
            print(idx)
            smax = psum[maxs0] if idx != maxs0 else psum[maxs1]
            smin = psum[mins0] if idx != mins0 else psum[mins1]
            dmax = pdif[maxd0] if idx != maxd0 else pdif[maxd1]
            dmin = pdif[mind0] if idx != mind0 else pdif[mind1]
            ret = min(max(smax - smin, dmax - dmin), ret)
        return ret
